dt: {bc}a sea monster defeated by {d_link|Yahweh|Yahweh} in various scriptural accounts

dt.t: this {wi}leviathan{/wi} of animals is the great Blue Whale

dt: {bc}a totalitarian state having a vast bureaucracy

et: Middle English, from Late Latin, from Hebrew {it}liwyāthān{/it}
shortdef: a sea monster defeated by Yahweh in various scriptural accounts
the political state; especially : a totalitarian state having a vast bureaucracy
